articles.title: Stranger Things Mid-Season-Premiere Recap: Plugged In - Vulture
articles.description: Will’s newfound powers let him plug into Vecna’s hive mind. Max and Holly go on the run. Nancy, Jonathan, Steve, and Dustin survey the Upside Down’s Hawkins lab (and argue).

articles.title: King Charles III calls for kindness and unity in Christmas message amid global conflicts - AP News
articles.description: King Charles III has urged people to focus on kindness instead of conflict in his annual Christmas address. Speaking from Westminster Abbey on Thursday, he highlighted the importance of companionship and kindness, especially during uncertain times. The speech…
